lead_paragraph: Jason Kander, an ex-military officer, released a TV ad in which he assembled an AR-15 blindfolded. Suddenly, his race against Senator Roy D. Blunt was close.

byline.contributor: Rachel Shorey contributed reporting from Washington.

headline.print_headline: Democrat, Deft With Rifle, Tightens Senate Race
headline.main: A Democrat Deft With a Firearm Tightens the Race for the Senate

snippet: Jason Kander, an ex-military officer, released a TV ad in which he assembled an AR-15 blindfolded. Suddenly, his race against Senator Roy D. Blunt was close....
abstract: Jason Kander, Democrat challenging Republican Roy Blunt for his United States Senate seat in Missouri.Democratic candidate for Missouri's Senate, surges ahead in polls after posting internet video of himself assembling AR-!5 assault rifle while blindfolded and reciting poem about gun rights; Kander's dramatic ascent illustrates volatile and shifting dynamics at play in battle for Senate.
